name: HepatitisCVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisCVirusAntigen
title: Hepatitis C Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis C virus Antigen)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hepatitis C Virus antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: examples: 
component: hepatitis C ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
